column6: In the fallout from AXIS, the Uncanny X-Men return to the Xavier school to lick their battle wounds. But for some, the events that transpired may have left a deeper wound than anyone realizes. Wounds heal, but sometimes the scars become too much to bear, and the ruby glasses come off.
column8: | penciller (cover):Kris Anka | artist:Chris Bachalo | writer:Brian Michael Bendis
